Localization.Name: ArcCorp
Localization.Description: This massive conglomerate owns one of the planets in the Stanton system, but got its start building fusion engines for industrial craft. They also have a division for terraforming that's diverged into more of a mining consortium.

English.Name: ArcCorp
English.Description: This massive conglomerate owns one of the planets in the Stanton system, but got its start building fusion engines for industrial craft. They also have a division for terraforming that's diverged into more of a mining consortium.

Localization.Name: Torrent
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whatever destination you choose, the ArcCorp Torrent quantum drive is a solid choice to help get you there direct and hassle-free.
